name: RE-WAR
description:
Take revenge on your extended family for the cowardly murder of the Queen at the helm of your advanced attack destroyer.

Controls:

  • W/A: Change throttle setting
  • S/D: Rudder
  • 1/Q: Target Port Artillery
  • 2/E: Target Starboard Artillery
  • 3/C: Target Point Defence Cannons
  • 4/F: Target Shield Breaker
  • Left Shift (Hold) + Space: Fire torpedo
  • RMB: Rotate Camera
  • Scroll: Zoom

RE-WAR was brought to you by:

  • Sean Mansell (@arknano): Code, Design, Concept
  • Mark Riley: Design, Narrative
  • Serguey Parkhomovsky (https://missioncrossing.bandcamp.com/): Music, Additional Code
  • Isaac McNicol (https://www.artstation.com/idymc): 3D Art
  • Josh Muhlback (https://www.artstation.com/zeddaxis): 3D Art
